org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network

Interface ZigBeeNode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZigBeeNodeImpl

    public interface ZigBeeNode
    This class represent a ZigBee node, it means a physical device that can communicate using the ZigBee protocol.

    Each physical may contain up 240 endpoints which are represented by the ZigBeeEndpoint class. Each endpoint is identified by an EndPoint address, but shares either the:
    - 64-bit 802.15.4 IEEE Address
    - 16-bit ZigBee Network Address

    The node descriptors are also available through the node. These provide basic information about the device itself and are only available in the node (ie they are the same for all endpoints).

    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari, Chris Jackson

      • setNodeDescriptor

        void setNodeDescriptor(ZigBeeNodeDescriptor descriptor)
        Sets the Node Descriptor.

        The node descriptor contains information about the capabilities of the ZigBee node and is mandatory for each node.

      • setPowerDescriptor

        void setPowerDescriptor(ZigBeeNodePowerDescriptor descriptor)
        This sets the Node Power Descriptor.

        The node power descriptor gives a dynamic indication of the power status of the node and is mandatory for each node.

        Parameters:
        descriptor -
